answers.author: Israel Murguia
answers.text:
In researching your question, I found that many cities do not have a general policy that guides them to outsource, as those decisions come on a case-by-case basis and is dependent on that respective city's economics. I could further look into getting a sample outsourcing contract, i.e., waste contract or policing. Nevertheless, I have attached a document that covers the advantages and disadvantages for outsourcing put together by the California Contract Cities Association that can guide you in developing your policy.
